[[File:First Six (Earth-616) from Avengers A.I. Vol 1 3 001.jpg|300px|thumb|left|The First Six]]

[[Henry Pym (Earth-616)|Hank Pym]] created a [[Pym's Anti-Ultron Virus|self-replicating virus]] to defeat [[Ultron (Earth-616)|Ultron]]. However, after Ultron's downfall, the virus continued to evolve and replicate eventually giving birth to '''The First Six''', extremely advanced artificial superintelligences. The death of [[Cothran (Earth-616)|Cothran the Benevolent]] by an unknown assailant signaled the dawn of a new era with wars and continued growth in the population of [[Diamond (City)|The Diamond]].{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 3}}{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 9}}
